document_data.mainbody: '''Kant Family''' was a chaka of [[Vaelan]], in [[Durpar]]. In {{yearlink|1374}}, at least one of its members had become a [[plangent]]; while he was en route to meet a secret lover, [[Shaddon Datharathi]] possessed him and made him give a loud hoot for no reason. The man had no memory of this event after the fact.{{cite book/Darkvision|154|16}}
